content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":257452,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、この永久地下牢は魔王大国ゼスが作った最大級の封印施設でもあるので","translatedEnglishLine":"However, this permanent underground prison is also one of the largest sealing facilities built by the Demon King nation, Zes."},{"lineNumber":257453,"originalJapaneseLine":"なかなか突破するのは疲れるぞ。ま、カミーラちゃんに会う為ならがんばろうー","translatedEnglishLine":"It's quite exhausting to break through. Well, if it's to meet Kamilla-chan, I'll do my best."},{"lineNumber":257454,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の者も止めるが聞かない","translatedEnglishLine":"Others try to stop me, but I don't listen."},{"lineNumber":257455,"originalJapaneseLine":"永久牢を移動中","translatedEnglishLine":"Moving through the permanent prison."},{"lineNumber":257456,"originalJapaneseLine":"警報が鳴る、侵入者有り・・","translatedEnglishLine":"An alarm rings—there is an intruder..."},{"lineNumber":257457,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺達の事か？とランスが思うが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance wonders, 'Is that us?' but..."},{"lineNumber":257458,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子（誰が同行しているかは任せます）","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic, Urza, Chizuruko (I'll leave who is accompanying to you)."},{"lineNumber":257459,"originalJapaneseLine":"違います、情報連絡を聞き分かる・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No, listen carefully to the information and you'll understand..."},{"lineNumber":257460,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍です、魔軍が地下通路からこの永久牢ブロックに現れました。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the demon army—they appeared in this permanent prison block via the underground passage."},{"lineNumber":257461,"originalJapaneseLine":"目的は・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Their objective is..."},{"lineNumber":257462,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラか・・これは競争だな","translatedEnglishLine":"Kamilla, huh... this is a race, then."},{"lineNumber":257463,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":257464,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile,"},{"lineNumber":257465,"originalJapaneseLine":"侵入した魔軍、ケイブワンが１５０名の精鋭部隊を率いてやってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"The invading demon army, led by Cave One, came with an elite unit of 150 men."},{"lineNumber":257466,"originalJapaneseLine":"我々がこの地を占領している間に見つけたら楽勝だったのに","translatedEnglishLine":"It would have been easy if they had been found while we occupied this land."},{"lineNumber":257467,"originalJapaneseLine":"何も人間に取り替えされたから分かるなんて・・めんどくさいな","translatedEnglishLine":"It's troublesome that they realized because humans were swapped in..."},{"lineNumber":257468,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達とケイブワン率いる１５０名の部隊が遭遇。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the 150-man unit led by Cave One encounter each other."},{"lineNumber":257469,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリス様も使徒使いが荒いですよ、この永久牢てほんとやっかい","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Cavebris’s apostle controllers are rough; this permanent prison is really troublesome."},{"lineNumber":257470,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう障害がいっぱいだし・・カミーラさんは怖いし、会いたくないな・・","translatedEnglishLine":"There are already so many obstacles... and Kamilla-san is scary; I don't want to meet her..."},{"lineNumber":257471,"originalJapaneseLine":"おわっ・・魔物か","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa... a monster?"},{"lineNumber":257472,"originalJapaneseLine":"わわわ・・人間だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"W-w-wait... it’s a human."},{"lineNumber":257473,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘に","translatedEnglishLine":"> Into battle."},{"lineNumber":257474,"originalJapaneseLine":"はぁ・・はぁ・・と必至で逃げてきたケイブワン","translatedEnglishLine":"Panting desperately, Cave One fled."},{"lineNumber":257475,"originalJapaneseLine":"恐ろしい連中でした。生きていてよかったー","translatedEnglishLine":"They were terrifying. I'm glad to be alive."},{"lineNumber":257476,"originalJapaneseLine":"このゼス方面では、魔人ガルティア様も魔人メディウサ様も倒されている","translatedEnglishLine":"In this Zes region, both the demon Galtia and demon Medusa have been defeated."},{"lineNumber":257477,"originalJapaneseLine":"ので怖くて近寄りたくなかったのに・・やっぱり怖かった","translatedEnglishLine":"So we were scared and didn't want to approach... but it was still frightening."},{"lineNumber":257478,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの凶悪な人間、魔人殺しのカオス持っていたし・・こわかった","translatedEnglishLine":"That ruthless human possessed the Chaos sword that kills demons... it was scary."},{"lineNumber":257479,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラさんは・・・見つからなかったという事にして帰ろう","translatedEnglishLine":"As for Kamilla-san... let's pretend we didn’t find her and go back."},{"lineNumber":257480,"originalJapaneseLine":"永久牢の中","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the permanent prison."},{"lineNumber":257481,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレックスと遭遇、アレックスは精鋭部隊を現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Encounter with Alex, who appeared with an elite unit."},{"lineNumber":257482,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の部隊は・・・？？","translatedEnglishLine":"What about the demon army’s unit...??"},{"lineNumber":257483,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺達がとっくに撃退したぞ、遅いわ","translatedEnglishLine":"We already repelled them long ago; you’re late."},{"lineNumber":257484,"originalJapaneseLine":"文句言われてもほっとしているアレックス","translatedEnglishLine":"Though complained at, Alex is relieved."},{"lineNumber":257485,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、いつまで防げるかは分からない、不安なので始末しておきたいが","translatedEnglishLine":"But we don't know how long we can hold them off; it's unsettling, so we want to eliminate them."},{"lineNumber":257486,"originalJapaneseLine":"我々ではカミーラを始末する事が出来ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"We cannot eliminate Kamilla ourselves."},{"lineNumber":257487,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスさんが持つ魔剣カオスで止めをさしてほしい、その為に来てくれたのですよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"We want Lance-san to finish her off with the magic sword Chaos—that's why you came, right?"},{"lineNumber":257488,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、そうだ、任せておけ。そこを通せ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, yes, leave it to me. Let us pass."},{"lineNumber":257489,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかりました。と騙されて道を空けるアレックス","translatedEnglishLine":"Understood. Alex is deceived and clears the way."},{"lineNumber":257490,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が立ち去った後、アレックスの元にエロピチャからの魔法通信","translatedEnglishLine":"After Lance and the others leave, Alex receives a magical transmission from Eropicha."},{"lineNumber":257491,"originalJapaneseLine":"婚約者です、がんばってねと男を立てる良い彼女な感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"It's from his fiancée, encouraging him with a feeling of supporting her man."},{"lineNumber":257492,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか永久地下牢を突破した","translatedEnglishLine":"They somehow broke through the permanent underground prison."},{"lineNumber":257493,"originalJapaneseLine":"封印の間に付いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the sealing chamber."},{"lineNumber":257494,"originalJapaneseLine":"中央に魔人カミーラが居る（封印カミーラ）","translatedEnglishLine":"In the center is the demon Kamilla (sealed Kamilla)."},{"lineNumber":257495,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスか久しぶりだな・・２年と８ヶ月ぶりだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, it's been a while... two years and eight months."},{"lineNumber":257496,"originalJapaneseLine":"また私を辱めに来たのか、それとも殺しに来たのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Have you come to disgrace me again, or to kill me?"},{"lineNumber":257497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　過去、ランスがカミーラの元に来たのは４回","translatedEnglishLine":"In the past, Lance has come to Kamilla four times."},{"lineNumber":257498,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　やってきてはエッチする、俺の女になれとか言うが断られている","translatedEnglishLine":"He came, had sex, said 'be my woman,' but was refused."},{"lineNumber":257499,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　お前がその気になるまで何度でも来るぞ（とかいいつ２年半開けてしまった）","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll come as many times as it takes until you agree (though he actually took two and a half years off)."},{"lineNumber":257500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　今回が５回目","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the fifth time."},{"lineNumber":257501,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　悪態はついているが、２年半ぶりとか待っていた感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"Though she insults him, it feels like she’s been waiting after two and a half years."},{"lineNumber":257502,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　実は・・他に誰も来ないし、少しずつランスに依存していた","translatedEnglishLine":"Actually... no one else has come, and she’s gradually become dependent on Lance."},{"lineNumber":257503,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　だが、それは絶対に表には出さないし、自分も気がついていない","translatedEnglishLine":"But she would never show that outwardly, and she doesn’t even realize it herself."},{"lineNumber":257504,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":257505,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラの存在に気が付くと、そうか・・お前はホーネット側についたのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Noticing Satela's presence, she says, 'I see... you’ve sided with Hornet.'"},{"lineNumber":257506,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日こそ私を殺しに来たのだな","translatedEnglishLine":"Today you have come to kill me, haven’t you?"},{"lineNumber":257507,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうよとサテラ、そうじゃとカオス","translatedEnglishLine":"'Yes,' says Satela. 'That’s right,' says Chaos."},{"lineNumber":257508,"originalJapaneseLine":"だがランスは、そんな事はしない、可愛い女は全て俺の物だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"But Lance won’t do that; all cute women belong to me."},{"lineNumber":257509,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここから出してやる、ついてこい。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll get you out of here. Follow me."},{"lineNumber":257510,"originalJapaneseLine":"イヤだ、お前なんかについていかない","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I won’t follow someone like you."},{"lineNumber":257511,"originalJapaneseLine":"困ったな、ケイブリスがもうすぐここやってくる。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is troublesome; Cavebris will be here soon."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、この永久地下牢は魔王大国ゼスが作った最大級の封印施設でもあるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, this permanent underground prison is also one of the largest sealing facilities built by the Demon King nation, Zes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なかなか突破するのは疲れるぞ。ま、カミーラちゃんに会う為ならがんばろうー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's quite exhausting to break through. Well, if it's to meet Kamilla-chan, I'll do my best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者も止めるが聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others try to stop me, but I don't listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永久牢を移動中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moving through the permanent prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警報が鳴る、侵入者有り・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An alarm rings—there is an intruder...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達の事か？とランスが思うが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance wonders, 'Is that us?' but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子（誰が同行しているかは任せます）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic, Urza, Chizuruko (I'll leave who is accompanying to you).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違います、情報連絡を聞き分かる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, listen carefully to the information and you'll understand...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍です、魔軍が地下通路からこの永久牢ブロックに現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the demon army—they appeared in this permanent prison block via the underground passage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their objective is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラか・・これは競争だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamilla, huh... this is a race, then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵入した魔軍、ケイブワンが１５０名の精鋭部隊を率いてやってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The invading demon army, led by Cave One, came with an elite unit of 150 men.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々がこの地を占領している間に見つけたら楽勝だったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would have been easy if they had been found while we occupied this land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何も人間に取り替えされたから分かるなんて・・めんどくさいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's troublesome that they realized because humans were swapped in...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達とケイブワン率いる１５０名の部隊が遭遇。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the 150-man unit led by Cave One encounter each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様も使徒使いが荒いですよ、この永久牢てほんとやっかい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Cavebris’s apostle controllers are rough; this permanent prison is really troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう障害がいっぱいだし・・カミーラさんは怖いし、会いたくないな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are already so many obstacles... and Kamilla-san is scary; I don't want to meet her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おわっ・・魔物か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa... a monster?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わわわ・・人間だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-w-wait... it’s a human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Into battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぁ・・はぁ・・と必至で逃げてきたケイブワン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Panting desperately, Cave One fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐ろしい連中でした。生きていてよかったー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were terrifying. I'm glad to be alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このゼス方面では、魔人ガルティア様も魔人メディウサ様も倒されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this Zes region, both the demon Galtia and demon Medusa have been defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ので怖くて近寄りたくなかったのに・・やっぱり怖かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So we were scared and didn't want to approach... but it was still frightening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの凶悪な人間、魔人殺しのカオス持っていたし・・こわかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That ruthless human possessed the Chaos sword that kills demons... it was scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラさんは・・・見つからなかったという事にして帰ろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for Kamilla-san... let's pretend we didn’t find her and go back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永久牢の中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the permanent prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレックスと遭遇、アレックスは精鋭部隊を現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encounter with Alex, who appeared with an elite unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の部隊は・・・？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What about the demon army’s unit...??

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達がとっくに撃退したぞ、遅いわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We already repelled them long ago; you’re late.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 文句言われてもほっとしているアレックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though complained at, Alex is relieved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、いつまで防げるかは分からない、不安なので始末しておきたいが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we don't know how long we can hold them off; it's unsettling, so we want to eliminate them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々ではカミーラを始末する事が出来ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cannot eliminate Kamilla ourselves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんが持つ魔剣カオスで止めをさしてほしい、その為に来てくれたのですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want Lance-san to finish her off with the magic sword Chaos—that's why you came, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、そうだ、任せておけ。そこを通せ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, yes, leave it to me. Let us pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかりました。と騙されて道を空けるアレックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Understood. Alex is deceived and clears the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が立ち去った後、アレックスの元にエロピチャからの魔法通信
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Lance and the others leave, Alex receives a magical transmission from Eropicha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 婚約者です、がんばってねと男を立てる良い彼女な感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's from his fiancée, encouraging him with a feeling of supporting her man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか永久地下牢を突破した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They somehow broke through the permanent underground prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 封印の間に付いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the sealing chamber.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中央に魔人カミーラが居る（封印カミーラ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the center is the demon Kamilla (sealed Kamilla).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスか久しぶりだな・・２年と８ヶ月ぶりだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, it's been a while... two years and eight months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また私を辱めに来たのか、それとも殺しに来たのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you come to disgrace me again, or to kill me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去、ランスがカミーラの元に来たのは４回
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the past, Lance has come to Kamilla four times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やってきてはエッチする、俺の女になれとか言うが断られている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He came, had sex, said 'be my woman,' but was refused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前がその気になるまで何度でも来るぞ（とかいいつ２年半開けてしまった）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll come as many times as it takes until you agree (though he actually took two and a half years off).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回が５回目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the fifth time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪態はついているが、２年半ぶりとか待っていた感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though she insults him, it feels like she’s been waiting after two and a half years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は・・他に誰も来ないし、少しずつランスに依存していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually... no one else has come, and she’s gradually become dependent on Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それは絶対に表には出さないし、自分も気がついていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But she would never show that outwardly, and she doesn’t even realize it herself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの存在に気が付くと、そうか・・お前はホーネット側についたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Noticing Satela's presence, she says, 'I see... you’ve sided with Hornet.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日こそ私を殺しに来たのだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today you have come to kill me, haven’t you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうよとサテラ、そうじゃとカオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Yes,' says Satela. 'That’s right,' says Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがランスは、そんな事はしない、可愛い女は全て俺の物だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Lance won’t do that; all cute women belong to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここから出してやる、ついてこい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll get you out of here. Follow me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イヤだ、お前なんかについていかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I won’t follow someone like you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困ったな、ケイブリスがもうすぐここやってくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is troublesome; Cavebris will be here soon.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I'm glad to be alive."},{"lineNumber":257476,"originalJapaneseLine":"このゼス方面では、魔人ガルティア様も魔人メディウサ様も倒されている","translatedEnglishLine":"In this Zes region, both the demon Galtia and demon Medusa have been defeated."},{"lineNumber":257477,"originalJapaneseLine":"ので怖くて近寄りたくなかったのに・・やっぱり怖かった","translatedEnglishLine":"So we were scared and didn't want to approach... but it was still frightening."},{"lineNumber":257478,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの凶悪な人間、魔人殺しのカオス持っていたし・・こわかった","translatedEnglishLine":"That ruthless human possessed the Chaos sword that kills demons... it was scary."},{"lineNumber":257479,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラさんは・・・見つからなかったという事にして帰ろう","translatedEnglishLine":"As for Kamilla-san... let's pretend we didn’t find her and go back."},{"lineNumber":257480,"originalJapaneseLine":"永久牢の中","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the permanent prison."},{"lineNumber":257481,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレックスと遭遇、アレックスは精鋭部隊を現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Encounter with Alex, who appeared with an elite unit."},{"lineNumber":257482,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の部隊は・・・？？","translatedEnglishLine":"What about the demon army’s unit...??"},{"lineNumber":257483,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺達がとっくに撃退したぞ、遅いわ","translatedEnglishLine":"We already repelled them long ago; translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、この永久地下牢は魔王大国ゼスが作った最大級の封印施設でもあるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, this permanent underground prison is also one of the largest sealing facilities built by the Demon King nation, Zes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なかなか突破するのは疲れるぞ。ま、カミーラちゃんに会う為ならがんばろうー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's quite exhausting to break through. Well, if it's to meet Kamilla-chan, I'll do my best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者も止めるが聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Others try to stop me, but I don't listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永久牢を移動中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moving through the permanent prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警報が鳴る、侵入者有り・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An alarm rings—there is an intruder...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達の事か？とランスが思うが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance wonders, 'Is that us?' but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック、ウルザ、千鶴子（誰が同行しているかは任せます）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic, Urza, Chizuruko (I'll leave who is accompanying to you).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違います、情報連絡を聞き分かる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, listen carefully to the information and you'll understand...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍です、魔軍が地下通路からこの永久牢ブロックに現れました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the demon army—they appeared in this permanent prison block via the underground passage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their objective is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラか・・これは競争だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamilla, huh... this is a race, then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵入した魔軍、ケイブワンが１５０名の精鋭部隊を率いてやってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The invading demon army, led by Cave One, came with an elite unit of 150 men.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々がこの地を占領している間に見つけたら楽勝だったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would have been easy if they had been found while we occupied this land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何も人間に取り替えされたから分かるなんて・・めんどくさいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's troublesome that they realized because humans were swapped in...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達とケイブワン率いる１５０名の部隊が遭遇。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the 150-man unit led by Cave One encounter each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様も使徒使いが荒いですよ、この永久牢てほんとやっかい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Cavebris’s apostle controllers are rough; this permanent prison is really troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう障害がいっぱいだし・・カミーラさんは怖いし、会いたくないな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are already so many obstacles... and Kamilla-san is scary; I don't want to meet her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おわっ・・魔物か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa... a monster?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わわわ・・人間だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-w-wait... it’s a human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Into battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぁ・・はぁ・・と必至で逃げてきたケイブワン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Panting desperately, Cave One fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐ろしい連中でした。生きていてよかったー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were terrifying. I'm glad to be alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このゼス方面では、魔人ガルティア様も魔人メディウサ様も倒されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this Zes region, both the demon Galtia and demon Medusa have been defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ので怖くて近寄りたくなかったのに・・やっぱり怖かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So we were scared and didn't want to approach... but it was still frightening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの凶悪な人間、魔人殺しのカオス持っていたし・・こわかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That ruthless human possessed the Chaos sword that kills demons... it was scary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラさんは・・・見つからなかったという事にして帰ろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for Kamilla-san... let's pretend we didn’t find her and go back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永久牢の中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the permanent prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレックスと遭遇、アレックスは精鋭部隊を現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encounter with Alex, who appeared with an elite unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の部隊は・・・？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What about the demon army’s unit...??

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達がとっくに撃退したぞ、遅いわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We already repelled them long ago; you’re late.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 文句言われてもほっとしているアレックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though complained at, Alex is relieved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、いつまで防げるかは分からない、不安なので始末しておきたいが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we don't know how long we can hold them off; it's unsettling, so we want to eliminate them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々ではカミーラを始末する事が出来ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cannot eliminate Kamilla ourselves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんが持つ魔剣カオスで止めをさしてほしい、その為に来てくれたのですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want Lance-san to finish her off with the magic sword Chaos—that's why you came, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、そうだ、任せておけ。そこを通せ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, yes, leave it to me. Let us pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかりました。と騙されて道を空けるアレックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Understood. Alex is deceived and clears the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が立ち去った後、アレックスの元にエロピチャからの魔法通信
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Lance and the others leave, Alex receives a magical transmission from Eropicha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 婚約者です、がんばってねと男を立てる良い彼女な感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's from his fiancée, encouraging him with a feeling of supporting her man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか永久地下牢を突破した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They somehow broke through the permanent underground prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 封印の間に付いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the sealing chamber.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中央に魔人カミーラが居る（封印カミーラ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the center is the demon Kamilla (sealed Kamilla).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスか久しぶりだな・・２年と８ヶ月ぶりだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, it's been a while... two years and eight months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また私を辱めに来たのか、それとも殺しに来たのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you come to disgrace me again, or to kill me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過去、ランスがカミーラの元に来たのは４回
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the past, Lance has come to Kamilla four times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やってきてはエッチする、俺の女になれとか言うが断られている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He came, had sex, said 'be my woman,' but was refused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前がその気になるまで何度でも来るぞ（とかいいつ２年半開けてしまった）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll come as many times as it takes until you agree (though he actually took two and a half years off).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回が５回目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the fifth time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪態はついているが、２年半ぶりとか待っていた感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though she insults him, it feels like she’s been waiting after two and a half years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は・・他に誰も来ないし、少しずつランスに依存していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually... no one else has come, and she’s gradually become dependent on Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それは絶対に表には出さないし、自分も気がついていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But she would never show that outwardly, and she doesn’t even realize it herself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの存在に気が付くと、そうか・・お前はホーネット側についたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Noticing Satela's presence, she says, 'I see... you’ve sided with Hornet.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日こそ私を殺しに来たのだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today you have come to kill me, haven’t you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうよとサテラ、そうじゃとカオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Yes,' says Satela. 'That’s right,' says Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがランスは、そんな事はしない、可愛い女は全て俺の物だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Lance won’t do that; all cute women belong to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここから出してやる、ついてこい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll get you out of here. Follow me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イヤだ、お前なんかについていかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I won’t follow someone like you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困ったな、ケイブリスがもうすぐここやってくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is troublesome; Cavebris will be here soon.
